snippet: Michal Handzus scored the go-ahead goal 6 minutes 45 seconds into the second period as Chicago won, 3-2, at home over the Islanders.
abstract: Chicago Blackhawks beat New York Islanders, 3-2; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Michal Handzus scored the go-ahead goal 6 minutes 45 seconds into the second period as Chicago won, 3-2, at home over the Islanders.

headline.main: Blackhawks Hold on to Defeat Islanders
headline.print_headline: Blackhawks Hold On to Defeat Islanders
